text:
Why It Pays to Shop Around for Health Insurance
By Jennifer Milner|Thursday, November 3, 2016

The Open Enrollment window is the period of time each year when you can enroll in a new health insurance plan. You can shop between November 1, 2016 andJanuary 31, 2017.Even if you love your current plan, heres why it still makes sense to explore your options for 2017:
And remember, dont shop by monthly premium alone. A health insurance plan that has a $100 monthly premium may look like the lowest cost plan, but after factoring in deductible, copays/coinsurance,and prescription costs, that same plan could end up costing more than one with a $200 monthly premium and higher levels of coverage.
If you have any questions or need help determining which health insurance plan is the best fit for you next year, give us a call at (866) 602-8466. Were here to help.
